clone_messages.__comment__: Clone messages in all channels (last messages). Long limit - long time need to copy
clone_messages.__comment_use_queue__: Clone messages using queue for each channels and caches all messages before sending
clone_messages.__comment_parallel__: Clone messages for all channels (can be used with queue)

live_update.__comment__: Automatically detect new messages and send it via webhook
live_update.__comment_2__: Also works with clone_messages (starts sending when channel is fully processed)
